name: MKPinAnnotationView
desc: An annotation view that displays a pin image on the map.

items.name: class func redPinColor() -> UIColor
items.desc: Returns the standard color for red pins.

items.name: class func greenPinColor() -> UIColor
items.desc: Returns the standard color for green pins.

items.name: class func purplePinColor() -> UIColor
items.desc: Returns the standard color for purple pins.

items.name: enum MKPinAnnotationColor
items.desc: The supported colors for pin annotations.

items.name: var pinTintColor: UIColor!
items.desc: The color of the pin head.

items.name: var animatesDrop: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the annotation view is animated onto the screen.

items.name: var pinColor: MKPinAnnotationColor
items.desc: The color of the pin head.
